data.lyric:
[ti:Lucid Dreams (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Hip Hop Hits 2021 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Lucid Dreams (Explicit) - Juice WRLD
[00:00.05]Lyrics by：Nick Mira/Dominic Miller/Sting/Juice WRLD/Danny Snodgrass, Jr.
[00:00.19]Composed by：Nick Mira/Dominic Miller/Sting/Juice WRLD/Danny Snodgrass, Jr.
[00:00.34]Enviyon on the mix
[00:01.63]
[00:07.59]No no no no
[00:09.20]
[00:12.70]No-no no no no
[00:15.14]No no no no no
[00:17.76]
[00:18.87]No no no no
[00:21.19]
[00:23.52]I still see your shadows in my room
[00:26.22]Can't take back the love that I gave you
[00:28.84]It's to the point where I love and I hate you
[00:31.54]And I cannot change you so I must replace you oh
[00:35.02]Easier said than done I thought you were the one
[00:37.96]Listenin' to my heart instead of my head
[00:40.93]You found another one but I am the better one
[00:43.73]I won't let you forget me
[00:45.13]
[00:46.31]I still see your shadows in my room
[00:49.09]Can't take back the love that I gave you
[00:51.85]It's to the point where I love and I hate you
[00:54.29]And I cannot change you so I must replace you oh
[00:57.94]Easier said than done I thought you were the one
[01:00.85]Listenin' to my heart instead of my head
[01:03.19]
[01:03.82]You found another one but I am the better one
[01:06.58]I won't let you forget me
[01:08.04]
[01:08.80]You left me falling and landing inside my grave
[01:14.54]I know that you want me dead
[01:17.94]
[01:20.15]I take prescriptions to make me feel a-okay
[01:25.97]I know it's all in my head
[01:29.73]
[01:31.73]I have these lucid dreams where I can't move a thing
[01:37.48]Thinking of you in my bed
[01:40.65]
[01:43.08]You were my everything
[01:45.90]Thoughts of a wedding ring
[01:48.79]Now I'm just better off dead
[01:52.74]Uh uh uh
[01:54.73]I'll do it over again
[01:56.18]I didn't want it to end
[01:57.46]I watch it blow in the wind
[01:58.82]I should've listened to my friends
[02:00.40]Leave this s**t in the past but I want it to last
[02:03.32]You were made outta plastic fake
[02:05.79]I was tangled up in your drastic ways
[02:08.66]Who knew evil girls had the prettiest face
[02:11.48]You gave me a heart that was full of mistakes
[02:14.34]I gave you my heart and you made heartbreak
[02:17.44]You made my heart break
[02:19.57]
[02:20.15]You made my heart ache
[02:21.20]I still see your shadows in my room
[02:23.05]You made my heart break
[02:25.39]
[02:25.91]You made my heart ache
[02:26.86]Can't take back the love that I gave you
[02:28.98]You made my heart break
[02:30.42]Were made outta plastic fake
[02:31.65]You made my heart ache
[02:32.99]I still see your shadows in my room
[02:34.60]You made my heart break again
[02:36.60]I was tangled up in your drastic ways
[02:37.75]Who knew evil girls had the prettiest face
[02:39.80]
[02:40.58]I still see your shadows in my room
[02:43.34]Can't take back the love that I gave you
[02:46.10]It's to the point where I love and I hate you
[02:48.51]And I cannot change you so I must replace you oh
[02:52.19]Easier said than done I thought you were the one
[02:55.20]Listenin' to my heart instead of my head
[02:57.44]
[02:58.01]You found another one but I am the better one
[03:00.83]I won't let you forget me
[03:02.32]
[03:03.50]I still see your shadows in my room
[03:06.20]Can't take back the love that I gave you
[03:08.94]It's to the point where I love and I hate you
[03:11.53]And I cannot change you so I must replace you oh
[03:15.14]Easier said than done I thought you were the one
[03:17.92]Listenin' to my heart instead of my head
[03:20.88]You found another one but I am the better one
[03:23.47]I won't let you forget me
[03:25.22]
[03:26.15]Leave this s**t in the past but I want it to last
[03:29.00]You were made outta plastic fake
[03:31.69]I was tangled up in your drastic ways
[03:34.38]Who knew evil girls had the prettiest face
[03:36.89]
[03:37.95]Easier said than done I thought you were
[03:40.35]
[03:42.31]Instead of my head
[03:43.67]You found another better one
[03:45.83]I won't let you forget me
data.trans:
[ti:Lucid Dreams (Explicit)]
[ar:Juice WRLD]
[al:Hip Hop Hits 2021 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.05]//
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.34]Enviyon参与制作
[00:01.63]
[00:07.59]//
[00:09.20]
[00:12.70]//
[00:15.14]//
[00:17.76]
[00:18.87]//
[00:21.19]
[00:23.52]在我的房间里 我似乎依然能看到你的身影
[00:26.22]对你的爱 早已无法收回
[00:28.84]问题的关键在于 我对你爱恨交织
[00:31.54]我无法改变你 所以我必须寻找你的替代品 
[00:35.02]说起来容易 做起来难 我曾以为你就是我的命中注定
[00:37.96]我听从了自己的心 我理智全无
[00:40.93]你找到了新欢 但我才是那个最适合你的人
[00:43.73]我绝不会让你忘记我
[00:45.13]
[00:46.31]在我的房间里 我似乎依然能看到你的身影
[00:49.09]对你的爱 早已无法收回
[00:51.85]问题的关键在于 我对你爱恨交织
[00:54.29]我无法改变你 所以我必须寻找你的替代品 
[00:57.94]说起来容易 做起来难 我曾以为你就是我的命中注定
[01:00.85]我听从了自己的心 我理智全无
[01:03.19]
[01:03.82]你找到了新欢 但我才是那个最适合你的人
[01:06.58]我绝不会让你忘记我
[01:08.04]
[01:08.80]你使我不断沉沦 将自己埋葬
[01:14.54]我知道你希望我不复存在
[01:17.94]
[01:20.15]我用药物麻痹自己 试图使自己感觉好点
[01:25.97]我知道这只是我的思想作祟
[01:29.73]
[01:31.73]过去的美好时光如同清晰的梦境 一遍遍上演 而我无力做出任何改变
[01:37.48]躺在床上 脑海里都是你的身影
[01:40.65]
[01:43.08]你就是我的一切
[01:45.90]幻想着我们的婚礼 婚戒
[01:48.79]现在的我 如同一具行尸走肉
[01:52.74]//
[01:54.73]我多希望我们能重新开始
[01:56.18]我不愿这份爱就这样凋零
[01:57.46]我眼睁睁看着它随风而逝
[01:58.82]我本该听从朋友们的建议
[02:00.40]早些放手 但我希望这份爱能天长地久
[02:03.32]你的虚情假意
[02:05.79]将我牢牢俘获
[02:08.66]谁能想到 这个邪恶的女孩 拥有天使般完美的容颜
[02:11.48]你给了我一颗虚情假意的心
[02:14.34]我向你献出我的真心 但你却使它支离破碎
[02:17.44]你使我心碎
[02:19.57]
[02:20.15]你使我心痛
[02:21.20]在我的房间里 我似乎依然能看到你的身影
[02:23.05]你使我心碎
[02:25.39]
[02:25.91]你使我心痛
[02:26.86]对你的爱 早已无法收回
[02:28.98]你使我心碎

[02:31.65]你使我心痛
[02:32.99]在我的房间里 我似乎依然能看到你的身影
[02:34.60]你再次使我心碎
[02:36.60]将我牢牢俘获
[02:37.75]谁能想到 这个邪恶的女孩 拥有天使般完美的容颜
